content: Hi all - the template goddess, yes Lisa Nelson, pointed me to the CCDA Occupational Data for Health Supplemental Guide which allows an observation (http://www.hl7.org/documentcenter/public_temp_4404AE3C-1C23-BA17-0C9E46DF1A5D5D49/ballots/2018JAN/downloads/CDAR2_IG_CCDA_ODH_R1_D1_2018JAN.pdf Section 3.8 (balloted but I guess not published). Is anyone using that template? Are you reporting Veteran status or military service in another way? ThanQ

The C-CDA R2.1 Supplemental Guide has some interesting templates defined that may be helpful to know about. The new and improved Social History Section it defines allows all these additional templates to be used in the Social History Section. Check them out: 3.1 Combat Zone Period Observation 29
3.2 Daily Work Hours Observation 31
3.3 Date of Retirement Observation 33
3.4 History of Employment Status Observation 36
3.5 Job Duty Observation 38
3.6 Occupational Hazard Observation 40
3.7 Past or Present Industry Observation 42
3.8 Past or Present Occupation Observation 44
3.9 Supervisory Level Observation 54
3.10 Usual Industry Observation 56
3.11 Usual Occupation Duration Observation 58
3.12 Usual Occupation Observation 60
3.13 Weekly Work Days Observation 66
3.14 Work Classification Observation 67
3.15 Work Schedule Observation

Wondering, "Where can I get a copy of this guide?" Come to SDWG this Thursday and find out more!!!
Do any EHR's currently support any of these templates?
